name: nextcloud-news
description: Nextcloud News is an RSS/Atom feed reader app integrated into a Nextcloud instance. It can sync across devices, categorize feeds, and offers simple offline reading capabilities.

features.title: Rss/atom Reader
features.description: Subscribe to news feeds and blogs with automatic update checking

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Group feeds into folders for structured content management

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Read articles on web, desktop, or mobile with synchronized read status

features.title: Offline Reading
features.description: Download articles for reading without internet connection on mobile apps

features.title: Unread Management
features.description: Mark articles as read automatically or manually with flexible options

features.title: Star Articles
features.description: Save favorite articles for later reference or archival

features.title: Keyboard Navigation
features.description: Browse feeds efficiently with customizable keyboard shortcuts

features.title: Feed Discovery
features.description: Find and subscribe to feeds from website URLs automatically
